text: Mariano Rajoy Sobredo (28 August 1921 – 1 November 2018), was a Spanish jurist and magistrate. He was president of the Provincial Audience of PontevedraDecreto 3202/1969, de 11 de diciembre, por el que se nombra Presidente de la Audiencia Provincial de Pontevedra a don Mariano Rajoy Sobredo. and father of former Prime Minister Mariano Rajoy. He was born in Santiago de Compostela. Rajoy Sobredo died in Madrid on 1 November 2018 at the age of 97.Muere el padre de Mariano Rajoy Muere el padre de Mariano Rajoy a los 97 años ==References== Category:1921 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish judges
title: Mariano Rajoy Sobredo
